messages.message:
:cypress-spin: Cypress on-call (Oct 28 - Nov 1):
Cypress is still red :red_circle: on master and aihub-uat because of some tests that fail consistently and are non-blocking in CI and some other flaky tests

However, Cypress CI was relatively smooth this week! :tada:

• Tests that needed fixes
    ◦ @danny.lan fixed `aihub-extraction` after it broke because we added a “Visual reasoning” field type
    ◦ @Udit fixed `review-manager-dashboard` by increasing some timeouts
• Summary of failing tests
    ◦ @Subash `search-app` has not passed on aihub-sandbox since last Monday
    ◦ @tony.shi is looking into the deployment loading timeouts  (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C029ZG026GZ/p1730332492913519?thread_ts=1730331332.650069&cid=C029ZG026GZ)for `deployment-notifications` , which is failing consistently on aihub-sandbox and aihub-uat - cc @Jessica 
    ◦ @Aayush `converse-app` is failing consistently on aihub-uat
    ◦ In CI, we actually have very few failing tests! :extreme-teamwork: (screenshot 1)
        ▪︎ `converse-app` fails sometimes because digitization takes a while (example (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/15322/overview/05be141d-fcda-4564-92c4-007117bd8957/replay?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&runStatus=PASSED&runStatus=FAILED&runStatus=RUNNING&runStatus=CANCELLED&runStatus=ERRORED&runStatus=NOTESTS&runStatus=TIMEDOUT&ts=1730423394537.6748&att=1))
        ▪︎ `aihub-extraction` was failing until Danny fixed it on Wednesday
• Summary of flaky tests
    ◦ @Serena `ground-truth-crud` is a non-blocking test in CI and fails often on aihub-sandbox
    ◦ @danny.lan `view-home-page` is flaky in 85% of CI runs
    ◦ @Jessica `deployment-api-instructions` is flaky in 62% of CI runs
    ◦ @danny.lan `custom-function-field` is flaky in 34% of CI runs

We believe the deployment timeout is likely due to ACL checks
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C07MSAPF8H3/p1730396706601019?thread_ts=1730322826.805059&cid=C07MSAPF8H3
I have a PR up for review that will make deployment-notifications not flaky! (though it won't fix the root cause, tbd on that)
